name: nudged
description: Affine transformation estimator e.g. for multi-touch gestures and calibration

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build:nudged-editor: npm run test:nudged-editor && browserify examples/nudged-editor/src/index.js -o examples/nudged-editor/app.js
scripts.build:nudged-taataa: npm run test:nudged-taataa && browserify examples/nudged-taataa/src/index.js -o examples/nudged-taataa/app.js
scripts.build:nudged-gesture: npm run test:nudged-gesture && browserify examples/nudged-gesture/src/index.js -o examples/nudged-gesture/app.js
scripts.build:typical-gesture: npm run test:typical-gesture && browserify examples/typical-gesture/src/index.js -o examples/typical-gesture/app.js
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:nudged-editor && npm run build:nudged-gesture && npm run build:typical-gesture
